attributes.action: Give animals their right to vote
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Every time i hear a cat or dog make a sound I think they are trying to tell me one thing, that THEY want to vote. They live in our houses, they eat our food, some even get dressed in human clothes (although they may not be too happy with this), so why do they not get a vote. Some people may say they shouldn't as they cant pay taxes but you then have to remeber neither do some humans who DO get to vote.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
